rows.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ
rows.translation: HAVE YOU NOT seen how your Lord dealt with the people of the elephants?
rows.transliteration: alam tara kayfa fa`ala rabbuka bi-aṣ-ḥābil fīl

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.

rows.translation: Did He not make their plan go wrong,
And sent hordes of chargers flying against them,
(While) you were pelting them with stones of porphyritic lava,
And turned them into pastured fields of corn?
